participant_1.background:
My most valuable possession is my Tigers baseball jersey.
I celebrated my birthday by going on a horseback riding trip.
I take care of my health because I want to live a long life to see my children grow up.
I write about my travels and experiences.
I went to the beach and relaxed.

participant_2.background:
I'm worried that my fantasies will get in the way of my new relationship.
my favorite drink is chocolate milk.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
i drive a 2011 volkswagen passa.
I'm going to try to talk to my spouse about spending more time together this weekend, even though I know it's a long shot.

content.text: Hello! What was your favorite part of your day?
My commute was the best part of my day, I got to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
That sounds really nice. I love listening to music on my commute too, it helps me relax.
Me too, what kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to indie and alternative rock.
Cool, I like a lot of different kinds too, but I mostly listen to electronica and hip hop.
I've been trying to get into electronica more, but I haven't found a lot of artists that I really like yet.
Oh, I could recommend you some artists if you want!
No problem! I'll send you a list of some of my favorite artists later.
